RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter

RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter Class Reference

#include <highlighter.h>

Inheritance diagram for RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

A base class for all highlighter.

Provides the needed interface for LuaHighlighter

Usage : create a QTextEdit and call addToDocument() with the QTextEdit's document as parameter : LuaHighlighter highlighter; QTextEdit* editor = new QTextEdit(); highlighter.addToDocument(editor->document());

See also:
LuaHighlighter
